allow:
Bash(git -C "C:\claudecode\Product planning newspaper" commit -m "feat: enhance newspaper visualization with prominent URLs and rich visual elements

- Move URL to immediately after headline for better visibility
- Add extensive CSS for visual hierarchy (article cards, info grids, badges)
- Implement spec lists with checkmarks
- Add tag clouds with colored badges
- Create summary boxes with highlights
- Add impact rating visual indicators
- Improve overall readability with cards and shadows")

Bash(git -C "C:\claudecode\Product planning newspaper" commit -m "feat: add card-based UI for newspaper articles

- Create ArticleCard component with expandable details
- Add NewspaperView with card grid layout
- Update newspaper page to use card-based UI
- Add mock data fallback for local development
- Cards show: icon, title, company, URL button, impact rating
- Click card to expand details (price, specs, tags)
- Minimize text, emphasize visual elements")
Bash(git -C "C:\claudecode\Product planning newspaper" commit -m "fix: add TypeScript type definition for articles array")
